#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int non_fib(long long int n)
{
   int fib[100001];
   fib[0] = 0;
   fib[1] = 1;
   fib[2] = 1;
   int i = 3;
   long long int  cnt = 0,l;
   while(1){
    fib[i] = fib[i-1]+fib[i-2];
    long long int d;
    d = fib[i]-fib[i-1]-1;
     l = cnt;
    cnt+=d;
    long long int ans;
    if(cnt>=n){
    ans = fib[i-1]+(n-l);
    return ans;
   }
   i++;
   }
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        long long int k= non_fib(n);
        cout<<k<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
